skill_constraints: Heavy reliance on senior developers for all complex tasks, creating bottlenecks.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior FE (fe.dev.2) and Senior BE (be.dev.2) are single points of failure for high-complexity tasks.
mitigation_strategies: The provided plan has significant gaps and imbalances, leading to high risk.

skill_constraints: Requires proactive cross-training and pair programming.
mitigation_strategies: Re-balance sprints to have a mix of FE/BE work. Assign underutilized BE/DevOps capacity to build out test automation and monitoring infrastructure earlier. Use pair programming for complex tasks (T027, T044) to mitigate key person dependency.
